directions.step:
Preheat oven to 400 degrees.
Halve the onions and arrange them in a greased baking dish or on a greased grill rack, dot with butter, and cook until tinged with black and brown, nearly charred, for 45 minutes to 1 hour and 15 minutes, brushing with more butter or oil as necessary to keep moist. Season with salt and pepper. Serve hot or chilled.
Yield: Serves 6 Recipe By :NATHALIE DUPREE COOKS SHOW#ND7104
